languages.text: {n}Заворчав, Ульфар утешительно изрекает:{/n} "Промеж достойных воинов принято измерять доблесть не славой предков, но личными подвигами".
{n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."
languages.original_text: {n}Заворчав, Ульфар утешительно изрекает:{/n} "Промеж достойных воинов принято измерять доблесть не славой предков, но личными подвигами".

languages.text: {n}乌尔法以安慰的语气低吼着。{/n}“对值得尊敬的战士而言，衡量勇气的标准并不是我们的祖先成就了什么伟业，而是我们自己做过什么。”
languages.original_text: {n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法以安慰的语气低吼着。{/n}“对值得尊敬的战士而言，衡量勇气的标准并不是我们的祖先成就了什么伟业，而是我们自己做过什么。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}唸りながら、ウルファーは慰めるような口調で話す{/n}「価値ある戦士の中では、 武勇は父祖の栄光によって測られるものではなく、自らの行いによって測られるものなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}唸りながら、ウルファーは慰めるような口調で話す{/n}「価値ある戦士の中では、 武勇は父祖の栄光によって測られるものではなく、自らの行いによって測られるものなのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar declara en un tono consolador y estruendoso:{/n} «Entre los guerreros dignos, el valor no se mide por la gloria de nuestros antepasados sino por nuestras propias acciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar declara en un tono consolador y estruendoso:{/n} «Entre los guerreros dignos, el valor no se mide por la gloria de nuestros antepasados sino por nuestras propias acciones».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dans un grognement réconfortant, Ulfar déclare :{/n} « Le courage d'un guerrier honorable ne se mesure pas à la gloire de ses ancêtres, mais à ses propres actes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un grognement réconfortant, Ulfar déclare :{/n} « Le courage d'un guerrier honorable ne se mesure pas à la gloire de ses ancêtres, mais à ses propres actes. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Grollend stimmt Ulfar einen versöhnlichen Ton an:{/n} "Unter würdigen Kriegern wird Tapferkeit nicht am Ruhm unserer Ahnen gemessen, sondern nur an unseren eigenen Taten."
languages.original_text: {n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Grollend stimmt Ulfar einen versöhnlichen Ton an:{/n} "Unter würdigen Kriegern wird Tapferkeit nicht am Ruhm unserer Ahnen gemessen, sondern nur an unseren eigenen Taten."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sesi gür çıkan Ulfar, teselli edici bir tonla konuşuyor.{/n} "Kudretli savaşçılar arasında yüreklilik, atalarımızın şanıyla değil de kendi başarılarımızla ölçülür."
languages.original_text: {n}Rumbling, Ulfar declares in a consoling tone,{/n} "Among worthy warriors, valour is not measured based on the glory of our ancestors, but on our own deeds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, gök gürültüsü gibi bir sesle, teselli edici bir tonda konuşuyor:{/n} "Kudretli savaşçılar arasında yüreklilik, atalarımızın şanıyla değil kendi başarılarımızla ölçülür."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
